title: Secret Garden
text: She said that very often—‘It was the custom.’ The native servants were always saying it. If one told them to do a thing their ancestors had not done for a thousand years they gazed mildly and said, ‘It is not the custom,’ and one knew that was the end of the matter.

title: Wind in the Willows
text: There’s real life for you, embodied in that little cart. The open road, the dusty highway, the heath, the hedgerows! Camps, villages, towns, cities! Here today, off somewhere else tomorrow! Travel, change, excitement! The whole world before you, and a horizon that’s always changing!

title: Photosynthesis Intro
text: Photosynthesis is a process in which green plants make their own food from sunlight, using leaves to produce sugar. It changes light energy into chemical energy stored as food. Carbon dioxide enters through tiny stomata, while water rises from roots to the leaves.
